trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around January 9th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsapprox 2000 on jan 9 2010 stepped outside and looking to the west a white light traveling at the the same height and path as the usual flight path to Seatac airport.maybe 5000 feet if that. it accelerated at decelerated at intervals and whe it decelerated it almost completely stopped. it did this approx 10 times. it stopped above us, at this time my son had came ouside. and also witnissed it. it cont to the east. when it seemed to reverse itself and cont where it was almost insantly. there wer no red or green lights , just the one light.the speed it was traveling was from dead stop to about 3-400 mph it was hard to tell. aprrox 5 miles south of Mchord airforce base. hope someone can find radar of it.lasted about 30 seconds
